message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for a limited time at the special price of $12,000. I believe it will be highly beneficial to you, and this offer reflects its true value.
Hi Alice, thanks for the offer but $12,000 is a bit too high for my budget. I'm interested in the product, but I could only consider a price closer to $6,000.
Hi Bob, I appreciate your interest.  While $12,000 represents its true value, I'm willing to come down to $9,500.  This is my final offer.
Hi Alice, I appreciate you working with me on the price.  While I understand the value, I'm still a bit off on what I can do. Would $7,500 be possible?
